basics.summary: Currently working as a Java Backend developer. Before starting being a software engineer I studied physics at Lobachevsky State University of Nizhni Novgorod. Passionate about automation, data analysis and machine leaning.

work.summary: Project details: Analytics and reporting platform for omnichannel contact center.
highlights: - Refactoring existing applications to replace proprietary base framework (Oracle Complex Event Processing) with open source alternative (Spring Integration) for fresh realese.
- Integration with existing platform of common services such as message bus (Apache Kafka), telemetry utilities, etc. for fresh release.
- Reworking architecture of system toward containerized microservices for fresh release.
- Troubleshooting/bugfix for issues/defects found by end customer.
